pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 3, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, October 3, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a speech at the start of the Paris Agreement debate in the House of Commons.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Rosh Hashanah celebration.

Closed to media.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
